simple-god.name: Apollo
simple-god.description: Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space by forcing their Worker to the space yours just vacated.

simple-god.name: Artemis
simple-god.description: Your Move: Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.

simple-god.name: Athena
simple-god.description: Opponent’s Turn: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn.

simple-god.name: Atlas
simple-god.description: Your Build: Your Worker may build a dome at any level.

simple-god.name: Demeter
simple-god.description: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.

simple-god.name: Hephaestus
simple-god.description: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block.

simple-god.name: Minotaur
simple-god.description: Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level.

simple-god.name: Pan
simple-god.description: Win Condition: You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels.

simple-god.name: Prometheus
simple-god.description: Your Turn: If your Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.
